metadata.title: Friday, 16th September, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) whether the Government has completed payments to the former Zambia Railways employees, who were retired between 1993 and 1996;
(b) if the payments have not been completed, why;
(c) what the total number of the affected former employees was, as of June, 2022;
(d) how much money was owed to the former employees at (c); and
(e) when all the former employees will be paid in full.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the construction of Mungwi Modern Market in Mungwi District has stalled;
(c) how much money was paid to the contractor, as of February, 2022; and
(d) what the cost of the outstanding works was.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify the villages around Sikuka area in Sioma Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(e) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development how many feeder roads are earmarked for rehabilitation in Milanzi Parliamentary Constituency in 2022, Ward by Ward.
